title: MNF Reaction, Blue Chip Roster Pieces and Fatal Flaw for Division Leaders
itunes:title: MNF Reaction, Blue Chip Roster Pieces and Fatal Flaw for Division Leaders
description:
Is the Chiefs offense more explosive than the Rams? DJ and Bucky react to, arguably, the greatest MNF contest ever by revealing their takeaways from the Chiefs-Rams battle royale (:20), including - was Mahomes' five-turnover performance bound to happen (2:00), is KC's offense more dynamic than the Rams (4:00), was Todd Gurley frustrated after LAR's win (7:25), the defensive tackle position might be forever changed after last night (12:10) and what pieces are needed to make a championship roster (15:30)? Next, the guys preview the Thanksgiving slate of games (26:50) and ponder if the Cowboys will take the reins in the NFC East (28:10). Finally, the guys share their fatal flaw for each division leader (30:50)!

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
